metadata.name: Import PowerShell Modules From Suspicious Directories
metadata.comment: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module "$env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module \'$env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module $env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module "$env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module \'$env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module $env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('import-module c:\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo "$env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo \'$env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo $env:temp\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo "$env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo \'$env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo $env:appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ipmo c:\\users\\public\\'))))

output.summary: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories
